document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

subSubSection.paragraph:
Pteroplatea australis Ramsay & Ogilby, 1886: 575
. Holotype : AMS A.9357. Type locality: Cape Hawke,
New
South Wales
, Australia .

Local synonymy:
Gymnura tentaculata—
Filewood, 1973 :11 (PNG).
Aetoplatea tentaculata—
Kailola, 1987 : 31 (Gulf of Papua; Yule Island).
Gymnura australis—
Last & Stevens, 2009: 464 (New Guinea); Yokota et al. , 2016: 513 (New Guinea);
White et al. , 2018
: 224, figs (PNG).

Remarks: First recorded from PNG by Filewood (1973) as
Gymnura tentaculata
. Very common in the bycatch of the Gulf of Papua prawn trawl fishery; also observed in catches of the trap fishery at Wewak on the north coast during recent surveys.
